code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useChatStore}from'../store/useChatStore';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{onEnterChatroom}=_ref;const{chatrooms,addChatroom,deleteChatroom}=useChatStore();const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const handleCreate=()=>{if(title.trim()){addChatroom(title);toast.success('Chatroom created!');setTitle('');}};const handleDelete=id=>{deleteChatroom(id);toast.success('Chatroom deleted!');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-xl mx-auto bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-lg rounded-2xl shadow-xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-center",children:"\uD83D\uDCAC Chatrooms"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"New chatroom name",className:"border border-gray-600 p-3 flex-1 rounded-xl bg-transparent text-white"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCreate,className:"bg-green-600 text-white p-3 rounded-xl hover:scale-105 transition duration-200",children:"\u2795"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-3",children:chatrooms.map(room=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center p-3 border border-gray-600 rounded-xl bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm shadow hover:scale-[1.01] transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-lg",children:room.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onEnterChatroom(room.id),className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded hover:scale-105 transition",children:"Open"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(room.id),className:"bg-red-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded hover:scale-105 transition",children:"\u274C"})]})]},room.id))})]});};export default Dashboard;
